description: Multi-project comparison shows aligned columns for each project

rowStructure.description: Each row has exactly N cells where N = number of projects
rowStructure.alignment: Cells are aligned by verse reference across columns

verificationNotes: All 10 verses should appear (GEN 1:1 through GEN 1:10)
Each row has exactly 3 cells (one per project)
Columns appear in order: primary project, then comparative texts in selection order
Reference column shows reference for primary project versification
All cells should align by verse reference
